name: Drifloon

evolution.description: Drifloon can evolve into Drifblim at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 11 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Balloon Pokémon. A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

abilities.name: Aftermath
abilities.description: This Pokémon deals damage to an attacker equal to half of the damage received when knocked out by a melee move.

abilities.name: Unburden
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is not holding an item, it gains 10 feet to its speed.

abilities.name: Flare Boost
abilities.description: This Pokémon adds proficiency to its damage rolls while burned.
